scripts.build: npm run build-js && cp -R src/static/ dist/
scripts.build-js: npx esbuild --format=esm --bundle --splitting --sourcemap --minify --target=es2020 --outdir=dist/js --external:crypto --external:worker_threads src/js/*.ts src/js/cubing/*.ts; for f in dist/js/cubing/*.js dist/js/three.js dist/js/scramble-display.js; do mv $f ${f%.js}; done
